issue.title: [CF 47] Please add stack count condition
issue.body:
It would be useful to be able to apply a condition that counted the number of stacks of a buff/debuff.   For instance, I'd like to create a condition that would show the "Focus Fire" icon only if there 5 stacks of "Frenzy Effect" buff present on my pet.


> Posted by CurseForge user Lokmar | Imported from CurseForge issue #47 | Raw

comments.body:
Have you even bothered to read the rest of the icon's config menu? There already is a stack filter.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Apparently not carefully enough. I'd looked for it under the edit conditions box but somehow missed it on the primary config menu.

Edited Nov 19, 2010

> Posted by CurseForge user Lokmar
